amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that Ngawang Choephel and other prisoners of conscience in Tibet, as well as in China, should be released immediately, and that the U.S. government should seek access for internationally recognized human rights groups to monitor human rights in Tibet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to expresss the sense of Congress Ngawnag Choephel and other prisoners of conscience in Tibet and China should be released immediately, and that the U.S. government should seek access for internationally recognized human rights groups to monitor human rights in Tibet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
